entry.title: Creating My New Blog
entry.summary: My previous blog can be found here which used the chirpy template. However, I found it relatively hard to customize, using jekly and graphql. Then while learning about prompt engineering here, the UI of the website really caught my attention. That is when I found Docusaurus. I liked the simplicity of the base design, but the flexible customization as it is built on Reactjs, something I am familiar with.
entry.content:
My previous blog can be found here which used the chirpy template. However, I found it relatively hard to customize, using jekly and graphql. Then while learning about prompt engineering here, the UI of the website really caught my attention. That is when I found Docusaurus. I liked the simplicity of the base design, but the flexible customization as it is built on Reactjs, something I am familiar with.

So this is my first post. Welcome to my website! I hope to maintain a blog, a list of projects that I have completed, and tutorials about topics I am interested in.
